name: sgrim
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5

stmt.origin: syl6reqr(c2, c3, cfv(cds, c4), wcel(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, cfv(cds, c4)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, cfv(cds, c4)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c4))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, cfv(cds, c4)))
-| wceq(c4, co(c5, cress, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cds, c5))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c4))
-| wceq(c4, co(c5, cress, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cds, c5))

comment: The induced metric on a subgroup is the induced metric on the parent group equipped with a norm. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2008.) (Revised by AV, 19-Oct-2021.)
